p: The novel coronavirus-19 (nCOV-19) or COVID-19 epidemic has started in Wuhan, China and rapidly spreading across the world and more than two million people got infected. It is a kind of infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ( Sun et al., 2020). This virus is easily spread among humans either by having close contact with an infected person or tiny droplets when people sneeze, cough, or talk. The severe diseases associated with COVID-19 are relatively high for the population with the definition of elevated risk factors and relatively moderate for the general population ( Brooke and Jackson, 2020). Preventive measures can be effective in reduction of virus transmission in the general public and in defined risk groups (elder groups), but this rate is not fully assessed. However, it can spread at a rapid pace without having any effective mitigation measures.
